name: Hentai Loli 3D
description:
Enjoy your personal virtual 3D girl.

Hentai Loli 3D

is a classic slide puzzle game which you play joined by a beautiful Loli.
Move the pieces of images around to complete the level. The picture shows Loli and may be 2x2, 2x3 or 3x3 puzzle. Unlock all of the levels to complete the game.

Features:

  • your personal virtual 3D girl
  • nine 2x2, 2x3 or 3x3 puzzles
  • beautiful artwork
